title: Maggie L Walker National Historic Site: Field Trips
body: Field Trips      Maggie L. Walker National Historic Site offers free, fun-filled curriculum-based educational programs throughout the year! Explore Maggie L. Walker NHS which includes a visitor center, exhibit building and Mrs. Walker's home. Participate in a variety of hands-on educational activities that are tailored to meet the Standards of Learning and will excite students to uncover the remarkable story of a 20th-century role model. Learn more about our curriculum-based programs. **To ensure that the field trips meet the needs of your school, we will only be taking reservations for field trips by phone. Please call 804-771-2017 x24 to reserve your tour.     Results  There are no results to show.
